post.author: 강동욱
post.content:
Go to http://www.citrix.com  and
go into the 'Site Map' and click 'Citrix Developer Network'

register and get the ID and logon.

You can get the a lot of resources and information. Particulaly from the 'White Page\\" there could be solution about VB application in Citrix.

Dongwook kang

>
>Dear coska members:
>I need your help.
>I am WANG CHOBO programmer.  
>My company has a project of building VB application on Citrix Metaframe which accesses local database on server machine,displays ,and processes the data according to client's request.
>Is there any restriction in developing VB application under Citrix Metaframe using Windows 2000 server? Which VB technology would be the best solution for Citrix Metaframe work? IIS application, ASP? Does  VB application for local machine work fine on Citrix?    
>
>???
>
>
>
>
post.title: [re] VB application on Citrix Metaframe
